TextBlock.Text: ALNUS: I have decided that the name of this planet shall be... <color=orange>Shattered Geode</color>!
BETULA: Wow! That's quite an impressive name Alnus!
ALNUS: This crystalline body is quite majestic, it only makes sense that it would receive a name of equal beauty.
ADONSONIA: Truly you possess great great humility, it is such a relief that you are in no way being strange about the name of this planet.
